question: Which of the following was the reason behind Gandhi organizing Kheda Satyagraha?
option1: Confiscation of land of those who did not pay the land tax to British Administration
option2: To end the discrimination between Ujla Paraj and the Kali Paraj
option3: To introduce permanent settlement in Gujarat
option4: It was revolt against conditions in indigo plant cultivation
answer: Confiscation of land of those who did not pay the land tax to British Administration
explanation:
Confiscation of land of those who did not pay the land tax to British Administration
Kheda Satyagraha took place in the year 1918 in Guarat. The main reason of the satyagraha was the confiscation of land of those who did not pay the land tax to British Administration. Gandhiji started this satyagraha with B.V. Patel and Indulal Yagnik. First option is the correct answer.
